channel.title: Web page loads slowly & other problems
channel.description:
Hello everyone! As you know, if you have seen my projects thread, and I have started a RuneScape Private Resource & Help Community that fathers Audio Tutorials and what not. Recently, I had one of my developers convert the template mockup to CSS/HTML. It all looks alright.
You can view the homepage of RuneGnosis at [URL=http://"http://www.runegnosis.com/"]www.runegnosis.com[/URL], [B]ANY help would be greatly appreciated![/B]
The problem? It's loading slow, and on different resolutions you can see that the bottom of it turns from gradiented into a black bar..
like this!
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/25i41o6.jpg[/img]

item.title: Web page loads slowly & other problems
item.dc:creator: @Fsig Fsig
item.description:
@Fsig wrote:

t4:

poorly designed, resource heavy templates?

This.

EVERYTHING is done with images…???
http://www.runegnosis.com/images/ (Note: Turn indexing off…)

1:) Try optimising your images for the web, you can use programs like Macromedia fireworks or Photoshop etc…
2:) Try styling your website with CSS and adding in content rather then just using images.
3:) Turn on Gzip.

If you are still having problems repeat steps 1 and 2.

Read full topic
